document_data.name: Evermead
document_data.mainbody: '''Evermead'''  was a liquor crafted by the [[elf|elves]] of [[Evermeet]]. Outside of the elven homeland, it was only sold through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.
document_data.Description:
Evermead was a sweet drink, flavored with [[cherry]] juice, [[vanilla]] beans, and [[rose]] petals.{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211017213551/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016 | accessdate = 10-17-2021| date = 10-17-2021}} Some compared the drink's taste to [[honeysuckle]] breeze, while others - to the taste of upper planes.

Evermead was the highest prized liquor consumed by the elves. The process by which Evermead was made remained unknown, but it was rumored to be aged for centuries before consumption. A single sip of this fine drink was said to be like tasting the higher planes themselves.
document_data.Availability:
Evermead was sold by [[Feldepost's Inn]] of [[Beregost]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] and the [[Friendly Arm]] inn for twenty one [[gold]] [[coin]] per serving.

Evermead was known to be imported into the city of [[Westgate]] for enjoyment of the wealth and nobility.
document_data.Prices:
Evermead could be purchased in the following containers:
* Bottle (30 [[gp]])
* Hand keg (50 gp)
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], certain evermead vintages reached exuberant prices. Bottles sealed in [[1123 DR]] were valued at 1,000 [[gp]].
